content: available in two sizes this cowl is meant to be snug and warm for those biting cold days a quick and easy knit with a very easy 2 row pattern repeat will have you making one of these for everyone in your home made with super bulky wool it is sure to keep you warm and is designed to easily cover your cheeks and ears when needed i ve even folded mine double and used as a headband/ear warmer materials needed needle - us 13 9 0mm 16- 22 circular or 13 dpns yarn- 1 skein tippy tree yarns super bulky 100g/76 yards sw 80/20merino/nylon blue jean baby snug /olive less snug gauge 10 5 sts and 17 row to 4 in stockinette in the round/unblocked*
